請輸入存款金額: Please enter the amount you'd like to deposit
銀行卡尚未綁定，請先綁定銀行卡: No registered bank card yet, please register a bank card first
請輸入銀行名稱: Please enter the name of your bank
請輸入銀行所在省份: Please enter the province of your bank
請輸入銀行所在城市: Please enter the city of your bank
請輸入銀行支行名稱: Please enter the branch name of your bank
請輸入銀行開戶人姓名: Please enter the name of your bank account
請輸入銀行帳號: Please enter the account number of your bank account
網路異常, 請重新嘗試: Internet not responding, please try again
銀行帳戶與會員資料不符，請確認您的銀行帳戶與會員資料相符: Your bank account information does not match your member information; please make sure they match
此銀行卡已被註冊使用，請選擇其他銀行卡: This bank card has already been registered; please select other bank cards
請先至會員中心設置錢包密碼後才能申請取款: Please set your wallet password at the member center before you apply for withdrawal
錢包密碼無誤，將前往取款頁面: Wallet password confirmed, proceeding to withdrawal page
敬愛的會員：虛擬帳號轉帳提供多家銀行帳號，\"虛擬帳號轉帳\"與\"超商代碼支付: Dear member: Virtual account transfers provide account information from multiple banks; after "virtual account transfers" and "convenience store code payment", you can check your transfers under "account notices"
如您要\"銀行轉帳\"存款前，請您先聯繫您的代理商及客服人員告知存款，存款完成，: Before depositing through "bank transfers", please notify your agents and customer service regarding the deposit; after completing the deposit, please enter the amount transferred correctly then "press submit".
晚上 12 點至凌晨 1 點之間為銀行固定維護時間，如於此期間進行轉帳，將於凌晨: Banks conduct system maintenance between 12 and 1 a.m.; if you transfer at this time, the transfers will arrive after 1 a.m.
若使用ATM櫃員機，可選擇轉帳 / 轉出 ( 轉帳單筆上限3萬元 ) 。: If you use an ATM, you can choose to transfer in or out (maximum NTD 30,000 per transfer).
本公司銀行帳號不定期變動，每次儲值前，請務必確認當前系統為您綁訂的專屬銀行帳號進: Our bank account numbers change at irregular intervals. Prior to payments, please ensure that your payment is made to the corresponding connected bank account. If your payment is not made to the specific bank account connected by the system, we will not recognize the payment.
每次提款最少點數為1000點以上，請務必確認填寫之帳號，若提供的帳號錯誤，恕本公: Every withdrawal must exceed 1,000 points. Please ensure the account information you have entered is correct. The company is not responsible for the validation of account information.
提款時需達到存款總金額的100%有效投注量才可提出申請。(PS:如利用本平臺進行: Withdrawals can only be submitted if they reach 100% of the effective betting amount of the total amount deposited. (PS: if the platform is used for money laundering behavior, we reserve the right to evaluate accounts or suspend services.)
請輸入銀行所在省: Please enter the province of the bank
請輸入銀行所在城市/州/區: Please enter the city/state/region where the bank is located
